transcript: I saw your post about the queen yeah well she amassed more wealth than 99.99 of the world she ruled for 70 years was a female Monarch which is insane and when I posted it had been I think five or six months since she had died and I was like you probably haven't thought about her today except for this post she probably accomplished more in her life than we probably will so if you were afraid of other people thinking about you just remember that six months after you died they're not going to be I think about death all the time that's what I think for me has given me a lot of uh freedom to take big shots
